Package org.grapheditor.editor.graph

This package contains classes to represent the graph structure.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
EdgeInformation This class represents information about an edge.
EditorGraph<V,E> This class is used as the datastructure for graphs in the GraphEditorPane.
GraphFile This class represents a graph file and is used by GraphSaver and GraphLoader classes.
GraphLoader Object of this class can read graphs into a graph pane from the xml-description of graphs.
GraphSaver Objects of this class saves a graphs from a GraphEditorPanee to a xml-file representation.
VertexInformation Ths class is used as vertex representation.
 

Enum Summary
VertexInformation.Shape An enumeration with the posible shapes of a vertex
 

Exception Summary
 

Package org.grapheditor.editor.graph Description

This package contains classes to represent the graph structure. VertexInformation and EdgeInformation are used to represent information about edges and vertices. The package also contains classes that is used to save and load graphs from files. These classes use the software library XStream to generate and load XML-code.
